attributes.action: include those taking blood pressure tablets to be (or any medication for life) exempt from prescription charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People taking blood pressure pills do so because of a risk of heart atack / stroke etc.They are not necessarily at risk because of weight or other factors.These pills have to be taken for life so charges should be exempt as they should for all medicines taken for life
